Package fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine

Class Transition

java.lang.Object
fr.cnrs.iees.rvgrid.statemachine.Transition
public class Transition extends Object

A transition between two states.

Since we assume that transitions are constructed after States, the state of origin is the one on which addTransition(...) is called, e.g.: 

 waiting = new State("waiting");
 running = new State("running");
 run = new Event(1,"run");
 waiting.addTransition(new Transition(running,run));

In other words, only the target state must be provided to the Transition constructor.

Author:
Shayne Flint - 2012

      Generic constructor.
      Parameters:
      toState - the target state
      event - the event triggering this transition
      procedure - the procedure to execute when the transition occurs
      guard - the guard condition to check before executing procedure
